  (function () {
    "use strict";

    // Check for reduced motion preference
    const prefersReducedMotion = window.matchMedia("(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)").matches;

    if (prefersReducedMotion) {
      return; // Exit early if user prefers reduced motion
    }

    // Use offsetParent for visibility check - avoids layout thrashing from getComputedStyle
    function isVisible(el) {
      return el.offsetParent !== null;
    }

    // Utility: Shuffle array
    function shuffleArray(arr) {
      const a = arr.slice();
      for (let i = a.length - 1; i > 0; i--) {
        const j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1));
        [a[i], a[j]] = [a[j], a[i]];
      }
      return a;
    }

    // Single global visibility change handler
    let activeTimelines = [];
    document.addEventListener("visibilitychange", () => {
      const action = document.hidden ? "pause" : "play";
      activeTimelines.forEach((tl) => {
        if (tl && tl[action]) tl[action]();
      });
    });

    function initLogoWallCycle(root) {
      const loopDelay = 1.5; // Loop Duration
      const duration = 0.9; // Animation Duration

      const list = root.querySelector("[data-logo-wall-list]");
      if (!list) return;

      const items = Array.from(list.querySelectorAll("[data-logo-wall-item]"));
      if (!items.length) return;

      const shuffleFront = root.getAttribute("data-logo-wall-shuffle") !== "false";
      const animateMode = root.getAttribute("data-logo-wall-animate"); // "load" or "scroll"
      const originalTargets = items.map((item) => item.querySelector("[data-logo-wall-target]")).filter(Boolean);

      if (!originalTargets.length) return;

      let visibleItems = [];
      let visibleCount = 0;
      let pool = [];
      let pattern = [];
      let patternIndex = 0;
      let tl;
      let hasAnimatedIn = false;
      let parentCache = new Map();
      let lastVisibilityCheck = 0;
      const VISIBILITY_CHECK_INTERVAL = 2000; // Only check visibility every 2 seconds

      // If animate mode is set, initially hide all items for entrance animation
      if (animateMode) {
        gsap.set(items, { autoAlpha: 0, y: 20 });
      }

      function animateEntrance(onComplete) {
        if (hasAnimatedIn) {
          if (onComplete) onComplete();
          return;
        }
        hasAnimatedIn = true;

        // Filter to only animate visible items
        const itemsToAnimate = items.filter(isVisible);

        gsap.to(itemsToAnimate, {
          autoAlpha: 1,
          y: 0,
          duration: 0.75,
          stagger: { each: 0.1 },
          ease: "power2.out",
          onComplete: onComplete,
        });
      }

      function setup() {
        if (tl) {
          tl.kill();
          activeTimelines = activeTimelines.filter((t) => t !== tl);
        }

        visibleItems = items.filter(isVisible);
        visibleCount = visibleItems.length;

        if (!visibleCount) return;

        pattern = shuffleArray(Array.from({ length: visibleCount }, (_, i) => i));
        patternIndex = 0;

        // Remove all injected targets
        items.forEach((item) => {
          item.querySelectorAll("[data-logo-wall-target]").forEach((old) => old.remove());
        });

        // Cache parent element lookups to avoid expensive :has() queries during animation
        parentCache.clear();
        visibleItems.forEach((container) => {
          const parent = container.querySelector("[data-logo-wall-target-parent]")
          || container.querySelector("*:has(> [data-logo-wall-target])")
          || container;
          parentCache.set(container, parent);
        });

        pool = originalTargets.map((n) => n.cloneNode(true));

        let front, rest;
        if (shuffleFront) {
          const shuffledAll = shuffleArray(pool);
          front = shuffledAll.slice(0, visibleCount);
          rest = shuffleArray(shuffledAll.slice(visibleCount));
        } else {
          front = pool.slice(0, visibleCount);
          rest = shuffleArray(pool.slice(visibleCount));
        }
        pool = front.concat(rest);

        for (let i = 0; i < visibleCount; i++) {
          const parent = visibleItems[i].querySelector("[data-logo-wall-target-parent]") || visibleItems[i];
          parent.appendChild(pool.shift());
        }

        tl = gsap.timeline({ repeat: -1, repeatDelay: loopDelay, paused: !!animateMode });
        tl.call(swapNext);
        activeTimelines.push(tl);
        if (!animateMode) tl.play();
      }

      function swapNext() {
        // Debounced visibility check - only run expensive check periodically
        const now = Date.now();
        if (now - lastVisibilityCheck > VISIBILITY_CHECK_INTERVAL) {
          lastVisibilityCheck = now;
          const nowCount = items.filter(isVisible).length;
          if (nowCount !== visibleCount) {
            setup();
            return;
          }
        }
        if (!pool.length) return;

        const idx = pattern[patternIndex % visibleCount];
        patternIndex++;

        const container = visibleItems[idx];
        if (!container) {
          setup();
          return;
        }

        // Use cached parent lookup instead of expensive :has() query
        const parent = parentCache.get(container) || container;

        const existing = parent.querySelectorAll("[data-logo-wall-target]");
        if (existing.length > 1) return;

        const current = parent.querySelector("[data-logo-wall-target]");
        const incoming = pool.shift();

        gsap.set(incoming, { yPercent: 50, autoAlpha: 0 });
        parent.appendChild(incoming);

        if (current) {
          gsap.to(current, {
            yPercent: -50,
            autoAlpha: 0,
            duration,
            ease: "expo.inOut",
            onComplete: () => {
              current.remove();
              pool.push(current);
            },
          });
        }

        gsap.to(incoming, {
          yPercent: 0,
          autoAlpha: 1,
          duration,
          delay: 0.1,
          ease: "expo.inOut",
        });
      }

      setup();

      // Handle entrance animation based on mode
      if (animateMode === "load") {
        // Use requestIdleCallback to defer animation start until browser is less busy
        const startAnimation = () => {
          animateEntrance(() => { if (tl) tl.play(); });
        };

        if ('requestIdleCallback' in window) {
          requestIdleCallback(() => gsap.delayedCall(0.2, startAnimation), { timeout: 500 });
        } else {
          gsap.delayedCall(0.5, startAnimation);
        }
      }

      // Single ScrollTrigger handles both entrance animation and pause/play when off-screen
      ScrollTrigger.create({
        trigger: root,
        start: "top bottom",
        end: "bottom top",
        onEnter: () => {
          if (animateMode === "scroll") {
            animateEntrance(() => { if (tl) tl.play(); });
          } else if (!animateMode && tl) {
            tl.play();
          }
        },
        onLeave: () => tl && tl.pause(),
        onEnterBack: () => tl && tl.play(),
        onLeaveBack: () => tl && tl.pause(),
      });
    }

    function init() {
      // Check if GSAP and plugins are loaded
      if (typeof gsap === "undefined" || typeof ScrollTrigger === "undefined") {
        console.error("GSAP or ScrollTrigger not loaded");
        return;
      }

      const wrappers = document.querySelectorAll(".logo_wall_wrap");
      if (!wrappers.length) return;

      wrappers.forEach((element) => {
        if (element.dataset.scriptInitialized) return;
        element.dataset.scriptInitialized = "true";

        const roots = element.querySelectorAll('[data-logo-wall-cycle-init="true"]');
        roots.forEach((root) => initLogoWallCycle(root));
      });
    }

    // Execute when DOM is ready or immediately if already loaded
    if (document.readyState === "loading") {
      document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", init);
    } else {
      init();
    }
  })();

</style></div><div class="u-embed-js w-embed w-script"><script>
  (function () {
    'use strict';

    // ---- tiny utilities ------------------------------------------------------
    function onDOMReady(cb) {
      if (
        document.readyState === "complete" ||
        document.readyState === "interactive"
      )
        cb();
      else document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", cb, { once: true });
    }

    function whenGSAPReady(cb) {
      // Check for GSAP - improved approach without constant polling
      if (window.gsap) {
        cb();
      } else {
        var attempts = 0;
        var maxAttempts = 100; // 4 seconds max wait
        var checkGSAP = function() {
          if (window.gsap) {
            cb();
          } else if (attempts < maxAttempts) {
            attempts++;
            setTimeout(checkGSAP, 40);
          } else {
            console.error('GSAP failed to load after 4 seconds');
          }
        };
        checkGSAP();
      }
    }

    // Shared click handler for closing dropdowns (event delegation)
    var activeDropdowns = [];

    function globalClickHandler(e) {
      activeDropdowns.forEach(function(dropdown) {
        if (dropdown.isOpen &&
            !dropdown.btn.contains(e.target) &&
            !dropdown.menu.contains(e.target)) {
          dropdown.close();
        }
      });
    }

    // Only add the global click listener once
    var globalClickListenerAdded = false;
    function ensureGlobalClickListener() {
      if (!globalClickListenerAdded) {
        document.addEventListener("click", globalClickHandler);
        globalClickListenerAdded = true;
      }
    }

    // Check for reduced motion once
    var prefersReducedMotion = window.matchMedia("(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)").matches;

    // ---- initializer ---------------------------------------------------------
    function initTabsComponent(comp) {
      if (!comp || comp.dataset.scriptInitialized) return;
      comp.dataset.scriptInitialized = "true";

      var menu = comp.querySelector('[data-tabs="menu"]');
      if (!menu) {
        console.warn("Tabs: menu not found", comp);
        return;
      }

      var tabs = Array.prototype.slice.call(
        menu.querySelectorAll('[data-tabs="tab"]')
      );
      var panels = Array.prototype.slice.call(
        comp.querySelectorAll('[data-tabs="panel"]')
      );

      // Get overflow elements
      var overflowParent = menu.querySelector('[data-tabs="overflow"]');
      var overflowBtn = menu.querySelector('[data-tabs="overflow-btn"]');
      var overflowMenu = menu.querySelector('[data-tabs="overflow-menu"]');
      var tabDropdownText = overflowBtn ? overflowBtn.querySelector('.tab_dropdown_text') : null;

      if (!tabs.length || !panels.length) {
        console.warn("Tabs: tabs or panels missing", comp);
        return;
      }

      // Dropdown state management
      var isDropdownOpen = false;

      // Initialize dropdown state
      function initDropdown() {
        if (!overflowParent || !overflowBtn || !overflowMenu) return;

        // Set initial state
        gsap.set(overflowMenu, {
          opacity: 0,
          y: 10,
          display: "none",
          pointerEvents: "none",
        });

        // Initialize dropdown text as hidden
        if (tabDropdownText) {
          tabDropdownText.style.display = 'none';
        }

        // Add click handler to dropdown button
        overflowBtn.addEventListener("click", function (e) {
          e.preventDefault();
          toggleDropdown();
        });

        // Register this dropdown for global click handling
        ensureGlobalClickListener();
        activeDropdowns.push({
          btn: overflowBtn,
          menu: overflowMenu,
          isOpen: false,
          close: closeDropdown,
          get isOpen() { return isDropdownOpen; }
        });
      }

      // Toggle dropdown open/close
      function toggleDropdown() {
        if (isDropdownOpen) {
          closeDropdown();
        } else {
          openDropdown();
        }
      }

      // Open dropdown with animation
      function openDropdown() {
        if (!overflowMenu || isDropdownOpen) return;

        isDropdownOpen = true;
        overflowBtn.setAttribute("aria-expanded", "true");

        gsap.set(overflowMenu, { display: "block" });
        gsap.to(overflowMenu, {
          opacity: 1,
          y: 0,
          duration: 0.3,
          ease: "power2.out",
          onComplete: function () {
            gsap.set(overflowMenu, { pointerEvents: "auto" });
          },
        });
      }

      // Close dropdown with animation
      function closeDropdown() {
        if (!overflowMenu || !isDropdownOpen) return;

        isDropdownOpen = false;
        overflowBtn.setAttribute("aria-expanded", "false");

        gsap.set(overflowMenu, { pointerEvents: "none" });
        gsap.to(overflowMenu, {
          opacity: 0,
          y: 10,
          duration: 0.2,
          ease: "power2.in",
          onComplete: function () {
            gsap.set(overflowMenu, { display: "none" });
          },
        });
      }

      // Manage dropdown text state
      function updateDropdownText(shouldShow, tabText) {
        if (!tabDropdownText) return;

        if (shouldShow && tabText) {
          tabDropdownText.style.display = 'flow-root';
          tabDropdownText.textContent = tabText;
        } else {

w-embed"><style>
  :root {
  	  --color-clay-shimmer: rgba(217, 119, 87, 0.5);
  }
  .welcome-terminal__ui-header {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 12px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    column-gap: 8px;
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.07);
    border-top-left-radius: var(--radius--main);
    border-top-right-radius: var(--radius--main);
  }

  .welcome-terminal__ui-control {
    width: 10px;
    height: 10px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background-color: var(--swatch--gray-500);
  }

  .welcome-terminal__ui-content {
    width: 100%;
    padding: var(--_spacing---space--2rem);
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
    white-space: pre;
    /* hanging-punctuation: first allow-end; */ /*This causes opening brackets to have weird positioning */
    min-height: 48ch;
  }

  .welcome-terminal__ui-title {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    white-space: pre;
    margin-bottom: 24px;
  }

  .welcome-terminal__ui-title span {
    display: block;
    color: var(--swatch--clay);
    display: inline;
  }

  .welcome-terminal__ui-title span.welcome-terminal__ui-title-line-label {
    color: var(--swatch--gray-000);
  }

  .welcome-terminal__ui-verbs,
  .welcome-terminal__ui-intro {
    visibility: hidden;
  }

  .welcome-terminal__ui-verbs {
    color: var(--swatch--clay);
  }

  .welcome-terminal__ui-verbs-container {
    display: flex;
    align-items: flex-start;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    column-gap: 6px;
    color: var(--swatch--clay);
  }

  .welcome-terminal__ui-verbs-dot {
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    transform: translateY(1.5px);
    visibility: hidden;
  }

  .welcome-terminal__ui-code {
    color: var(--swatch--gray-600);
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    line-height: 85%;
  }

  .welcome-terminal__ui-code span {
    display: none;
  }

  .welcome-terminal__ui-code .lvl-two {
    margin-left: 1rem;
  }

  .welcome-terminal__ui-code .lvl-three {
    margin-left: 2rem;
  }

  .welcome-terminal__ui-code .new-line {
    margin-top: 1.25rem;
  }

  .shimmer-text {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--swatch--clay) 30%, var(--color-clay-shimmer) 70%, var(--swatch--clay) 100%);
    background-size: 300% 100%;
    animation: shimmer 16s infinite;
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    text-fill-color: transparent;
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
    padding: .2em 0;
  }

  @keyframes shimmer {  
    0% {
      background-position: 300% 0;
    }
    100% {
      background-position: -300% 0;
    }
  }
  
  @media (max-width: 380px) {
  	.welcome-terminal_ui {
    	font-size: 13px;
    }
  }

</style>



<div class="welcome-terminal__ui-header">
  <div class="welcome-terminal__ui-control"></div>
  <div class="welcome-terminal__ui-control"></div>
  <div class="welcome-terminal__ui-control"></div>
</div>

<div class="welcome-terminal__ui-content">
  <h2 class="welcome-terminal__ui-title">
    <span>╭───────────────────────────╮</span>
    <span>│                           │</span>
    <span>│ <span class="welcome-terminal__ui-title-line-label">✶ Welcome to Claude Code</span>  │</span>
    <span>│                           │</span>
    <span>╰───────────────────────────╯</span>
  </h2>

  <p class="welcome-terminal__ui-intro">> Think harder...</p>

  <pre class="welcome-terminal__ui-code">
            <span>while(curious) {</span>
              <span class="lvl-two">question everything();</span>
              <span class="lvl-two">dig_deeper();</span>
              <span class="lvl-two">connect_dots(unexpected);</span>

              <span class="lvl-two new-line">if (stuck) {</span>         
                <span class="lvl-three">keep_thinking();</span>
              <span class="lvl-two">}</span>
            <span>}</span>
          </pre>

  <div class="welcome-terminal__ui-verbs-container">
    <span class="welcome-terminal__ui-verbs-dot">*</span>
    <p class="welcome-terminal__ui-verbs">Brewing…</p>
  </div>
</div></div><div class="u-embed-js w-embed w-script"><script type="module">
  // Use IIFE to avoid polluting global scope
  (function () {
    "use strict";

    // Check for reduced motion preference
    const prefersReducedMotion = window.matchMedia("(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)").matches;

    if (prefersReducedMotion) {
      return; // Exit early if user prefers reduced motion
    }

    const selectors = {
      title: ".welcome-terminal__ui-title",
      titleLine: ".welcome-terminal__ui-title > span",
      intro: ".welcome-terminal__ui-intro",
      verbsContainer: ".welcome-terminal__ui-verbs-container",
      verbs: ".welcome-terminal__ui-verbs",
      verbsDot: ".welcome-terminal__ui-verbs-dot",
      code: ".welcome-terminal__ui-code",
      codeLine: ".welcome-terminal__ui-code > span",
    };

    const asterisks = ["·", "✢", "✳", "✻", "✽"];

    const verbs = ["Forging…", "Weaving…", "Casting…", "Stirring…", "Shaping…", "Mending…", "Tuning…", "Spinning…", "Carving…", "Summoning…"];

    class WelcomeTerminal {
      tl = null;
      introChars = null;
      verbsChars = null;
      asteriskInterval = null;
      isInitialized = false;

      constructor(el) {
        this.el = el;
      }

      // Lazy initialization - only runs when element is visible
      init() {
        if (this.isInitialized) return;
        this.isInitialized = true;

        this.splitChars();
        this.animateAsterisks();

        this.tl = gsap.timeline({
          scrollTrigger: {
            trigger: this.el,
            start: "top bottom",
          },
        });

        this.tl.set(selectors.intro, { autoAlpha: 1 }, ">+=0.25");

        this.tl.from(
          this.introChars.chars,
          {
            opacity: 0,
            stagger: 0.075,
            duration: 0.05,
          },
          "<"
        );

        this.tl.to(
          this.introChars.chars?.[0],
          {
            opacity: 0.3,
            duration: 0.65,
            repeat: -1,
            yoyo: true,
          },
          "<+=0.25"
        );

        this.tl.set(selectors.verbsDot, { autoAlpha: 1 }, ">+=0.5");

        this.tl.set(selectors.verbs, { autoAlpha: 1 }, ">");

        this.tl.from(
          this.verbsChars.chars,
          {
            opacity: 0,
            stagger: 0.075,
            duration: 0.05,
            onComplete: () => {
              this.verbsChars.revert();
              document.querySelector(selectors.verbs).classList.add("shimmer-text");
            },
          },
          ">"
        );

        verbs
          .sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5)
          .filter((verb, index) => index < 4)
          .forEach((verb) => {
            this.tl.to(
              selectors.verbs,
              {
                text: {
                  value: verb,
                },
                duration: 0,
              },
              ">+=0.45"
            );
          });

        this.tl.set(selectors.code, { display: "block", paddingBottom: "10px" }, ">+=0.5");

        const codeLines = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll(selectors.codeLine));

        codeLines.forEach((line, index) => {
          this.tl.set(line, { display: "block" }, ">");
          this.tl.from(
            line.querySelectorAll(".code-char"),
            {
              opacity: 0,
              stagger: 0.035,
              duration: 0.075,
            },
            ">"
          );
        });

        this.tl.to(
          selectors.verbsContainer,
          {
            autoAlpha: 0,
            duration: 0.05,
          },
          ">+=0.25"
        );
      }

      splitChars() {
        this.introChars = new SplitText(selectors.intro, {
          type: "chars",
        });

        this.verbsChars = new SplitText(selectors.verbs, {
          type: "chars",
        });

        this.codeChars = new SplitText(selectors.code, {
          type: "chars",
          charsClass: "code-char",
        });
      }

      animateAsterisks() {
        let asteriskIndex = 0;
        let direction = 1;

        this.asteriskInterval = setInterval(() => {
          // Move index forward or backward
          asteriskIndex += direction;
          if (asteriskIndex === asterisks.length - 1 || asteriskIndex === 0) {
            direction *= -1;
          }

          gsap.to(selectors.verbsDot, {
            text: {
              value: asterisks[asteriskIndex],
            },
            duration: 0.15,
          });
        }, 150);
      }

      // Cleanup method to stop animations when element leaves viewport
      cleanup() {
        if (this.asteriskInterval) {
          clearInterval(this.asteriskInterval);
          this.asteriskInterval = null;
        }
        if (this.tl) {
          this.tl.kill();
        }
      }
    }

    // Use Intersection Observer to only initialize when visible
    function setupIntersectionObserver() {
      const element = document.querySelector(".welcome-terminal_wrap");

      if (!element) {
        console.warn(".welcome-terminal_wrap element not found");
        return;
      }

      const terminal = new WelcomeTerminal(element);

      const observerOptions = {
        root: null,
        rootMargin: "100px", // Start loading slightly before visible
        threshold: 0.1,
      };

      const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            terminal.init();
            // Optionally unobserve after initialization if animation should only run once
            // observer.unobserve(entry.target);
          } else {
            // Optional: cleanup when out of view to save resources
            // Uncomment if you want to pause animations when not visible
            // terminal.cleanup();
          }
        });
      }, observerOptions);

      observer.observe(element);
    }

    // Initialize based on document state
    function init() {
      // Check if GSAP and plugins are loaded
      if (typeof gsap === "undefined" || typeof SplitText === "undefined") {
        console.error("GSAP or required plugins not loaded");
        return;
      }

      gsap.registerPlugin(SplitText, ScrollTrigger, TextPlugin);
      setupIntersectionObserver();
    }

    // Execute when DOM is ready or immediately if already loaded
    if (document.readyState === "loading") {
      document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", init);
    } else {
      init();
    }
  })();

w-script"><!-- Add copy functionality to elements that have the "data-copy" attribute -->
<script>
  // Detect OS and show appropriate command
  (function() {
    'use strict';

    // Check for reduced motion preference
    const prefersReducedMotion = window.matchMedia('(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)').matches;

    // Detect OS once and cache result
    let osDetected = false;

    function detectAndSetCommandOS() {
      if (osDetected) return;
      osDetected = true;

      // Check for test parameter
      const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
      const isTestPC = urlParams.has('pc');

      // Modern API with fallback - detect Mac or Linux
      const isMacOrLinux = isTestPC ? false : (
        navigator.userAgentData
        ? (navigator.userAgentData.platform.toLowerCase().includes('mac') ||
           navigator.userAgentData.platform.toLowerCase().includes('linux'))
        : /Mac|iPhone|iPod|iPad|Linux/i.test(navigator.userAgent)
      );

      if (!isMacOrLinux) {
        const macCommands = document.querySelectorAll('[data-command-os="mac"]');
        const pcCommands = document.querySelectorAll('[data-command-os="pc"]');

        macCommands.forEach(el => el.style.display = 'none');
        pcCommands.forEach(el => el.style.display = 'flex');
      }
    }

    // Copy functionality with event delegation
    function handleCopyClick(event) {
      const target = event.target.closest('[data-copy]');

      if (!target) return;

      const textToCopy = target.getAttribute('data-copy');

      // Feature detection for Clipboard API
      if (!navigator.clipboard) {
        console.error('Clipboard API not available');
        return;
      }

      navigator.clipboard.writeText(textToCopy)
        .then(() => {
        let btnText = target.querySelector('.command_card_text');

        if (btnText) {
          showCopiedFeedback(btnText, prefersReducedMotion);
        } else {
          // Create temporary feedback element
          btnText = document.createElement('span');
          btnText.className = 'command_card_text';
          btnText.textContent = "Copied!";
          target.appendChild(btnText);

          if (prefersReducedMotion) {
            // No animation, just show and remove
            setTimeout(() => {
              target.removeChild(btnText);
            }, 1000);
          } else {
            btnText.style.opacity = '0';
            btnText.style.transition = 'opacity 0.3s ease';

            requestAnimationFrame(() => {
              btnText.style.opacity = '1';

              setTimeout(() => {
                btnText.style.opacity = '0';
                setTimeout(() => {
                  if (btnText.parentNode) {
                    target.removeChild(btnText);
                  }
                }, 300);
              }, 1000);
            });
          }
        }
      })
        .catch(err => console.error('Copy failed:', err));
    }

    function showCopiedFeedback(btnText, skipAnimation) {
      // Store original HTML once
      const originalHTML = btnText.innerHTML;

      if (skipAnimation) {
        // No animation for reduced motion preference
        btnText.innerHTML = "Copied!";
        setTimeout(() => {
          btnText.innerHTML = originalHTML;
        }, 1000);
        return;
      }

      // Cache computed styles once before any changes
      const computedStyle = window.getComputedStyle(btnText);
      const originalWidth = computedStyle.width;
      const originalStyles = {
        webkitLineClamp: computedStyle.webkitLineClamp,
        lineClamp: computedStyle.lineClamp,
        overflow: computedStyle.overflow,
        textOverflow: computedStyle.textOverflow,
        whiteSpace: computedStyle.whiteSpace
      };

      // Set up for transition while preserving line-clamp
      btnText.style.minWidth = originalWidth;
      btnText.style.transition = 'opacity 0.3s ease';

      // Fade out
      btnText.style.opacity = '0';

      // Use a single setTimeout chain instead of nested callbacks
      setTimeout(() => {
        btnText.innerHTML = "Copied!";
        btnText.style.opacity = '1';

        setTimeout(() => {
          btnText.style.opacity = '0';

          setTimeout(() => {
            btnText.innerHTML = originalHTML;

            // Restore original line-clamp properties
            if (originalStyles.webkitLineClamp !== 'none') {
              btnText.style.webkitLineClamp = originalStyles.webkitLineClamp;
              btnText.style.lineClamp = originalStyles.lineClamp;
              btnText.style.overflow = originalStyles.overflow;
              btnText.style.textOverflow = originalStyles.textOverflow;
              btnText.style.whiteSpace = originalStyles.whiteSpace;
            }

            btnText.style.opacity = '1';

            setTimeout(() => {
              btnText.style.transition = '';
              btnText.style.minWidth = '';
            }, 300);
          }, 300);
        }, 1000);
      }, 300);
    }

    // Initialize
    function init() {
      detectAndSetCommandOS();
      // Use event delegation on document - more efficient than multiple listeners
      document.addEventListener('click', handleCopyClick);
    }

    // Execute when DOM is ready or immediately if already loaded
    if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init);
    } else {
      init();
    }
  })();

I would like to explore these samples but focus on the parenchymal cells and differences between adult and pediatric liver. class="pictogram_lottie"></div><div class="u-embed-js w-embed w-script"><script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    document.querySelectorAll(".pictogram_lottie_wrap").forEach((root) => {
      if (root.dataset.scriptInitialized) return;
      root.dataset.scriptInitialized = "true";

      /* ===================== CONFIG ===================== */
      const COLOR_MAP = {
        fills: [
          // Dark foreground
          { from: ["#131314", "rgb(19,19,20)", "rgb(19, 19, 20)", "#141413", "rgb(20,20,19)", "rgb(20, 20, 19)"],
           to: "var(--_theme---foreground-primary)" },

          // Light accent
          { from: ["#e3dacc", "rgb(227,218,204)", "rgb(227, 218, 204)"],
           to: "var(--_theme---pictogram-accent)" }
        ],
        strokes: [
          // None found in these three, keep your red mapping if other files use it
          { from: ["#ff0000", "rgb(255,0,0)", "rgb(255, 0, 0)"],
           to: "var(--_theme---pictogram-accent)" }
        ]
      };

      const FORCE_MODE = true; 
      const OBS_ROOT_MARGIN = root.getAttribute("data-lottie-rootmargin") || "0px 0px -10% 0px";
      const OBS_THRESHOLD   = Math.min(1, Math.max(0, Number(root.getAttribute("data-lottie-threshold") || 0.2)));

      /* ===================== helpers ===================== */
      const normHex = (hex) => {
        const h = String(hex||"").trim().toLowerCase();
        if (!h) return null;
        let v = h.startsWith("#") ? h.slice(1) : h;
        if (v.length===3) v = v.split("").map(c=>c+c).join("");
        if (v.length===6) return "#" + v;
        if (v.length===8) return "#" + v.slice(0,6);
        return null;
      };
      const toHex2 = (n) => Math.max(0,Math.min(255,Math.round(n))).toString(16).padStart(2,"0");
      const normRgb = (rgb) => {
        const m = String(rgb||"").replace(/\s+/g,"").match(/^rgba?\((\d+),(\d+),(\d+)(?:,([\d.]+))?\)$/i);
        if (!m) return null;
        return "#" + toHex2(+m[1]) + toHex2(+m[2]) + toHex2(+m[3]);
      };
      const normColor = (c) => {
        if (!c || /^none$/i.test(c)) return null;
        if (/^var\(/i.test(c)) return null; 
        return normHex(c) || normRgb(c);
      };

      function buildPairs() {
        const fills = [];
        const strokes = [];
        COLOR_MAP.fills.forEach(({from, to}) => {
          (Array.isArray(from)?from:[from]).forEach(f=>{
            const k = normColor(f);
            if (k) {
              const [r,g,b] = [k.slice(1,3),k.slice(3,5),k.slice(5,7)].map(v=>parseInt(v,16));
              fills.push({ hex:k, rgbLoose:new RegExp(`rgb\\s*\\(\\s*${r}\\s*,\\s*${g}\\s*,\\s*${b}\\s*\\)`,"gi"), to });
            }
          });
        });
        COLOR_MAP.strokes.forEach(({from, to}) => {
          (Array.isArray(from)?from:[from]).forEach(f=>{
            const k = normColor(f);
            if (k) {
              const [r,g,b] = [k.slice(1,3),k.slice(3,5),k.slice(5,7)].map(v=>parseInt(v,16));
              strokes.push({ hex:k, rgbLoose:new RegExp(`rgb\\s*\\(\\s*${r}\\s*,\\s*${g}\\s*,\\s*${b}\\s*\\)`,"gi"), to });
            }
          });
        });
        return { fills, strokes };
      }

      function recolorSvg(svgRoot, pairs) {
        if (!svgRoot) return;
        const maybeSwap = (val, list) => {
          const n = normColor(val);
          if (!n) return null;
          const hit = list.find(p => p.hex === n);
          return hit ? hit.to : null;
        };

        const nodes = svgRoot.querySelectorAll("path, rect, circle, ellipse, polygon, polyline, line, g, use");
        nodes.forEach(el => {
          const fAttr  = el.getAttribute("fill");
          const fStyle = el.style && el.style.fill ? el.style.fill : null;
          const fTo    = maybeSwap(fAttr, pairs.fills) || maybeSwap(fStyle, pairs.fills);
          if (fTo) { el.setAttribute("fill", fTo); if (el.style) el.style.fill = fTo; }

          const sAttr  = el.getAttribute("stroke");
          const sStyle = el.style && el.style.stroke ? el.style.stroke : null;
          const sTo    = maybeSwap(sAttr, pairs.strokes) || maybeSwap(sStyle, pairs.strokes);
          if (sTo) { el.setAttribute("stroke", sTo); if (el.style) el.style.stroke = sTo; }
        });

        svgRoot.querySelectorAll("stop").forEach(stop => {
          const scAttr  = stop.getAttribute("stop-color");
          const scStyle = stop.style && stop.style.stopColor ? stop.style.stopColor : null;
          const fTo     = maybeSwap(scAttr, pairs.fills) || maybeSwap(scStyle, pairs.fills);
          if (fTo) { stop.setAttribute("stop-color", fTo); if (stop.style) stop.style.stopColor = fTo; }
        });

        svgRoot.querySelectorAll("style").forEach(s => {
          const before = s.textContent || "";
          let css = before;
          pairs.fills.forEach(({hex, rgbLoose, to}) => {
            css = css.replace(new RegExp(hex.replace('#','\\#'), "gi"), to);
            css = css.replace(rgbLoose, to);
          });
          pairs.strokes.forEach(({hex, rgbLoose, to}) => {
            css = css.replace(new RegExp(hex.replace('#','\\#'), "gi"), to);
            css = css.replace(rgbLoose, to);
          });
          if (css !== before) s.textContent = css;
        });
      }

      /* ===================== setup per element ===================== */
      const src        = root.getAttribute("data-lottie-src");
      const loop       = !/^(false|0|no)$/i.test(String(root.getAttribute("data-lottie-loop")||"true"));
      const speed      = Number(root.getAttribute("data-lottie-speed")||1) || 1;
      const direction  = Number(root.getAttribute("data-lottie-direction")||1) === -1 ? -1 : 1;

      if (!src) return;

      let host = root.querySelector("[data-lottie-host]");
      if (!host) {
        host = document.createElement("div");
        host.setAttribute("data-lottie-host","");
        host.style.width = "100%";
        host.style.height = "100%";
        root.appendChild(host);
      }

      const prefersReducedMotion = matchMedia("(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)").matches;
      const pairs = buildPairs();
      const isDotLottie = /\.lottie(\?|#|$)/i.test(src);
      const hasDot = typeof customElements !== "undefined" && !!customElements.get("dotlottie-player");
      let api = null;

      if (isDotLottie && hasDot) {
        const player = document.createElement("dotlottie-player");
        player.setAttribute("src", src);
        player.setAttribute("renderer", "svg");
        player.setAttribute("autoplay", "false");
        player.setAttribute("loop", loop ? "true" : "false");
        player.style.width = "100%";
        player.style.height = "100%";
        host.innerHTML = "";
        host.appendChild(player);

        api = {
          isReady:false,
          play(){ try{ player.play(); }catch(e){} },
          pause(){ try{ player.pause(); }catch(e){} },
          setSpeed(n){ try{ player.speed = Number(n)||1; }catch(e){} },
          setDirection(d){ try{ player.direction = (d===-1?-1:1); }catch(e){} },
        };

        player.addEventListener("ready", () => {
          api.isReady = true;
          api.setSpeed(speed);
          api.setDirection(direction);
          const svgRoot = player.shadowRoot && player.shadowRoot.querySelector("svg");
          if (svgRoot) {
            recolorSvg(svgRoot, pairs);
            if (FORCE_MODE) (function loopRecolor(){ if (!root.isConnected) return; recolorSvg(svgRoot, pairs); requestAnimationFrame(loopRecolor); })();
          }
          if (prefersReducedMotion) api.pause();
        });

      } else {
        if (!window.lottie || !window.lottie.loadAnimation) return;
        const anim = window.lottie.loadAnimation({
          container: host,
          renderer: "svg",
          loop,
          autoplay: false,
          path: src
        });
        api = {
          isReady:false,
          play(){ try{ anim.play(); }catch(e){} },
          pause(){ try{ anim.pause(); }catch(e){} },
          setSpeed(n){ try{ anim.setSpeed(Number(n)||1); }catch(e){} },
          setDirection(d){ try{ anim.setDirection(d===-1?-1:1); }catch(e){} },
        };
        anim.addEventListener("DOMLoaded", () => {
          api.isReady = true;
          api.setSpeed(speed);
          api.setDirection(direction);
          const svgRoot = host.querySelector("svg");
          if (svgRoot) {
            recolorSvg(svgRoot, pairs);
            if (FORCE_MODE) (function loopRecolor(){ if (!root.isConnected) return; recolorSvg(svgRoot, pairs); requestAnimationFrame(loopRecolor); })();
          }
          if (prefersReducedMotion) api.pause();
        });
      }

      const io = new IntersectionObserver((entries)=>{
        if (!api || !api.isReady) return;
        entries.forEach(e=>{
          const inView = e.isIntersecting && e.intersectionRatio >= OBS_THRESHOLD;
          if (prefersReducedMotion) { api.pause(); return; }
          inView ? api.play() : api.pause();
        });
      }, { root:null, rootMargin: OBS_ROOT_MARGIN, threshold: OBS_THRESHOLD });
      io.observe(root);

      const mo = new MutationObserver(() => {
        if (!document.body.contains(root)) {
          try{ io.disconnect(); }catch(e){}
          try{ mo.disconnect(); }catch(e){}
        }
      });
      mo.observe(document.body, { childList:true, subtree:true });
    });
  });
</script></div></div></div></div><div data-animate-header-heading="" class="c-heading-header u-child-contain u-mb-text w-richtext u-max-width-30ch"><h2>Get started with Claude Code</h2></div><div data-animate-header-cta="" class="header_main_cta"></div><div data-wf--spacer--section-space="even" class="u-section-spacer w-variant-41fc0c0a-cac3-53c9-9802-6a916e3fb342 u-ignore-trim"></div></div><div data-animate-card-wrap="" data-tabs="component" data-wf--tab-component--variant="center-aligned" class="tab_component u-grid-above u-column-indent"><div class="u-embed-css w-embed"><style>

</style></div><div class="u-embed-js w-embed w-script"><script>
  (function () {
    'use strict';

    // ---- tiny utilities ------------------------------------------------------
    function onDOMReady(cb) {
      if (
        document.readyState === "complete" ||
        document.readyState === "interactive"
      )
        cb();
      else document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", cb, { once: true });
    }

    function whenGSAPReady(cb) {
      // Check for GSAP - improved approach without constant polling
      if (window.gsap) {
        cb();
      } else {
        var attempts = 0;
        var maxAttempts = 100; // 4 seconds max wait
        var checkGSAP = function() {
          if (window.gsap) {
            cb();
          } else if (attempts < maxAttempts) {
            attempts++;
            setTimeout(checkGSAP, 40);
          } else {
            console.error('GSAP failed to load after 4 seconds');
          }
        };
        checkGSAP();
      }
    }

    // Shared click handler for closing dropdowns (event delegation)
    var activeDropdowns = [];

    function globalClickHandler(e) {
      activeDropdowns.forEach(function(dropdown) {
        if (dropdown.isOpen &&
            !dropdown.btn.contains(e.target) &&
            !dropdown.menu.contains(e.target)) {
          dropdown.close();
        }
      });
    }

    // Only add the global click listener once
    var globalClickListenerAdded = false;
    function ensureGlobalClickListener() {
      if (!globalClickListenerAdded) {
        document.addEventListener("click", globalClickHandler);
        globalClickListenerAdded = true;
      }
    }

    // Check for reduced motion once
    var prefersReducedMotion = window.matchMedia("(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)").matches;

    // ---- initializer ---------------------------------------------------------
    function initTabsComponent(comp) {
      if (!comp || comp.dataset.scriptInitialized) return;
      comp.dataset.scriptInitialized = "true";

      var menu = comp.querySelector('[data-tabs="menu"]');
      if (!menu) {
        console.warn("Tabs: menu not found", comp);
        return;
      }

      var tabs = Array.prototype.slice.call(
        menu.querySelectorAll('[data-tabs="tab"]')
      );
      var panels = Array.prototype.slice.call(
        comp.querySelectorAll('[data-tabs="panel"]')
      );

      // Get overflow elements
      var overflowParent = menu.querySelector('[data-tabs="overflow"]');
      var overflowBtn = menu.querySelector('[data-tabs="overflow-btn"]');
      var overflowMenu = menu.querySelector('[data-tabs="overflow-menu"]');
      var tabDropdownText = overflowBtn ? overflowBtn.querySelector('.tab_dropdown_text') : null;

      if (!tabs.length || !panels.length) {
        console.warn("Tabs: tabs or panels missing", comp);
        return;
      }

      // Dropdown state management
      var isDropdownOpen = false;

      // Initialize dropdown state
      function initDropdown() {
        if (!overflowParent || !overflowBtn || !overflowMenu) return;

        // Set initial state
        gsap.set(overflowMenu, {
          opacity: 0,
          y: 10,
          display: "none",
          pointerEvents: "none",
        });

        // Initialize dropdown text as hidden
        if (tabDropdownText) {
          tabDropdownText.style.display = 'none';
        }

        // Add click handler to dropdown button
        overflowBtn.addEventListener("click", function (e) {
          e.preventDefault();
          toggleDropdown();
        });

        // Register this dropdown for global click handling
        ensureGlobalClickListener();
        activeDropdowns.push({
          btn: overflowBtn,
          menu: overflowMenu,
          isOpen: false,
          close: closeDropdown,
          get isOpen() { return isDropdownOpen; }
        });
      }

      // Toggle dropdown open/close
      function toggleDropdown() {
        if (isDropdownOpen) {
          closeDropdown();
        } else {
          openDropdown();
        }
      }

      // Open dropdown with animation
      function openDropdown() {
        if (!overflowMenu || isDropdownOpen) return;

        isDropdownOpen = true;
        overflowBtn.setAttribute("aria-expanded", "true");

        gsap.set(overflowMenu, { display: "block" });
        gsap.to(overflowMenu, {
          opacity: 1,
          y: 0,
          duration: 0.3,
          ease: "power2.out",
          onComplete: function () {
            gsap.set(overflowMenu, { pointerEvents: "auto" });
          },
        });
      }

      // Close dropdown with animation
      function closeDropdown() {
        if (!overflowMenu || !isDropdownOpen) return;

        isDropdownOpen = false;
        overflowBtn.setAttribute("aria-expanded", "false");

        gsap.set(overflowMenu, { pointerEvents: "none" });
        gsap.to(overflowMenu, {
          opacity: 0,
          y: 10,
          duration: 0.2,
          ease: "power2.in",
          onComplete: function () {
            gsap.set(overflowMenu, { display: "none" });
          },
        });
      }

      // Manage dropdown text state
      function updateDropdownText(shouldShow, tabText) {
        if (!tabDropdownText) return;

        if (shouldShow && tabText) {
          tabDropdownText.style.display = 'flow-root';
          tabDropdownText.textContent = tabText;
        } else {
          tabDropdownText.style.display = 'none';
          tabDropdownText.textContent = '';
        }
      }

      // Get current dropdown button width including text
      function getDropdownButtonWidth() {
        if (!overflowBtn) return 50;

        // Temporarily show to measure if hidden
        var wasHidden = overflowParent.style.display === 'none';
        if (wasHidden) {
          overflowParent.style.display = 'block';
        }

        var width = overflowBtn.getBoundingClientRect().width;

        // Hide again if it was hidden
        if (wasHidden) {
          overflowParent.style.display = 'none';
        }

        return width || 50;
      }

      // Cache for tab widths to avoid repeated measurements
      var tabWidthCache = [];
      var cacheValid = false;

      function invalidateCache() {
        cacheValid = false;
      }

      function getTabWidth(index) {
        if (!cacheValid || !tabWidthCache[index]) {
          tabWidthCache[index] = tabs[index].getBoundingClientRect().width;
        }
        return tabWidthCache[index];
      }

      function calculateVisibleTabs(availableWidth) {
        var cumulativeWidth = 0;
        var visibleCount = 0;

        for (var i = 0; i < tabs.length; i++) {
          var tabWidth = getTabWidth(i);

          if (cumulativeWidth + tabWidth <= availableWidth) {
            cumulativeWidth += tabWidth;
            visibleCount++;
          } else {
            break;
          }
        }

        return visibleCount;
      }

      function handleOverflowTabs() {
        if (!overflowParent || !overflowBtn || !overflowMenu) return;

        // Invalidate cache on recalculation
        invalidateCache();

        // Reset all tabs to visible for accurate measurement
        tabs.forEach(function(tab) {
          tab.style.display = 'flex';
        });

        // Measure the actual flex container (.tab_menu_inner)
        var parentRect = menu.getBoundingClientRect();
        var parentWidth = parentRect.width;
        var style = getComputedStyle(menu);
        var paddingLeft = parseFloat(style.paddingLeft) || 0;
        var paddingRight = parseFloat(style.paddingRight) || 0;
        parentWidth = parentWidth - paddingLeft - paddingRight;

        // First pass: calculate without dropdown
        overflowParent.style.display = 'none';
        updateDropdownText(false);

        // Mark cache as valid for this calculation cycle
        cacheValid = true;

        var initialVisibleCount = calculateVisibleTabs(parentWidth);
        if (initialVisibleCount >= tabs.length) {
          // All fit, hide dropdown
          tabs.forEach(function(tab) { tab.style.display = 'flex'; });
          overflowMenu.innerHTML = '';
          return;
        }

        // Re-enable dropdown for split
        overflowParent.style.display = 'block';
        updateDropdownText(false);

        var dropdownWidth = getDropdownButtonWidth();
        var availableWidth = parentWidth - dropdownWidth;

        var visibleCount = Math.max(1, Math.min(calculateVisibleTabs(availableWidth), 5));
        var visibleTabs = tabs.slice(0, visibleCount);
        var overflowTabs = tabs.slice(visibleCount);

        // Hide overflow tabs
        overflowTabs.forEach(function (tab) { tab.style.display = 'none'; });

        // Populate dropdown
        overflowMenu.innerHTML = '';
        overflowTabs.forEach(function (tab) {
          var clone = tab.cloneNode(true);
          clone.style.display = 'flex';
          clone.classList.remove('is-active');
          clone.setAttribute('aria-selected', 'false');
          clone.setAttribute('tabindex', '-1');
          clone.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            setActive(tabs.indexOf(tab));
            closeDropdown();
          });
          overflowMenu.appendChild(clone);
        });

        // If active tab is in dropdown, show its text
        var activeInDropdown = activeIndex >= visibleCount;
        if (activeInDropdown) {
          updateDropdownText(true, tabs[activeIndex].textContent.trim());
        }

        updateDropdownTabStates();
      }

      // Update active states in dropdown
      function updateDropdownTabStates() {
        if (!overflowParent || !overflowMenu) return;

        var dropdownTabs = overflowMenu.querySelectorAll('[data-tabs="tab"]');
        var activeTabInDropdown = tabs[activeIndex].style.display === 'none';

        dropdownTabs.forEach(function(dropdownTab, index) {
          var originalIndex = tabs.findIndex(function(tab) {
            return tab.textContent.trim() === dropdownTab.textContent.trim();
          });

          if (originalIndex === activeIndex) {

        tabs[prev].classList.remove("is-active");

        tabs[next].classList.add("is-active");

        tabs[next].setAttribute("tabindex", "0");

        panels[prev].hidden = true;
        panels[next].hidden = false;

        }

        // Update dropdown states (if not already done by recalculation)
        if (!needsRecalculation) {

        }

      var lastParentWidth = 0;

          var currentParentWidth = menu.parentElement.getBoundingClientRect().width;

      }

      window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize);

      // Initialize everything
      handleOverflowTabs();

      lastParentWidth = menu.parentElement.getBoundingClientRect().width;

      // Enhanced cleanup function
      comp._tabsCleanup = function() {
        window.removeEventListener('resize', handleResize);

  /* Row visibility based on data-logo-wall-rows attribute (1, 2, or 3 rows) */

  }

</style></div><div class="u-embed-js w-embed w-script"><script>
  (function () {
    "use strict";

    // Check for reduced motion preference
    const prefersReducedMotion = window.matchMedia("(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)").matches;

    if (prefersReducedMotion) {
      return; // Exit early if user prefers reduced motion
    }

    // Use offsetParent for visibility check - avoids layout thrashing from getComputedStyle
    function isVisible(el) {
      return el.offsetParent !== null;
    }

    // Utility: Shuffle array
    function shuffleArray(arr) {
      const a = arr.slice();
      for (let i = a.length - 1; i > 0; i--) {
        const j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1));
        [a[i], a[j]] = [a[j], a[i]];
      }
      return a;
    }

    // Single global visibility change handler
    let activeTimelines = [];
    document.addEventListener("visibilitychange", () => {
      const action = document.hidden ? "pause" : "play";
      activeTimelines.forEach((tl) => {
        if (tl && tl[action]) tl[action]();
      });
    });

    function initLogoWallCycle(root) {
      const loopDelay = 1.5; // Loop Duration
      const duration = 0.9; // Animation Duration

      const list = root.querySelector("[data-logo-wall-list]");
      if (!list) return;

      const items = Array.from(list.querySelectorAll("[data-logo-wall-item]"));
      if (!items.length) return;

      const shuffleFront = root.getAttribute("data-logo-wall-shuffle") !== "false";
      const animateMode = root.getAttribute("data-logo-wall-animate"); // "load" or "scroll"
      const originalTargets = items.map((item) => item.querySelector("[data-logo-wall-target]")).filter(Boolean);

      if (!originalTargets.length) return;

      let visibleItems = [];
      let visibleCount = 0;
      let pool = [];
      let pattern = [];
      let patternIndex = 0;
      let tl;
      let hasAnimatedIn = false;
      let parentCache = new Map();
      let lastVisibilityCheck = 0;
      const VISIBILITY_CHECK_INTERVAL = 2000; // Only check visibility every 2 seconds

      // If animate mode is set, initially hide all items for entrance animation
      if (animateMode) {
        gsap.set(items, { autoAlpha: 0, y: 20 });
      }

      function animateEntrance(onComplete) {
        if (hasAnimatedIn) {
          if (onComplete) onComplete();
          return;
        }
        hasAnimatedIn = true;

        // Filter to only animate visible items
        const itemsToAnimate = items.filter(isVisible);

        gsap.to(itemsToAnimate, {
          autoAlpha: 1,
          y: 0,
          duration: 0.75,
          stagger: { each: 0.1 },
          ease: "power2.out",
          onComplete: onComplete,
        });
      }

      function setup() {
        if (tl) {
          tl.kill();
          activeTimelines = activeTimelines.filter((t) => t !== tl);
        }

        visibleItems = items.filter(isVisible);
        visibleCount = visibleItems.length;

        if (!visibleCount) return;

        pattern = shuffleArray(Array.from({ length: visibleCount }, (_, i) => i));
        patternIndex = 0;

        // Remove all injected targets
        items.forEach((item) => {
          item.querySelectorAll("[data-logo-wall-target]").forEach((old) => old.remove());
        });

        // Cache parent element lookups to avoid expensive :has() queries during animation
        parentCache.clear();
        visibleItems.forEach((container) => {
          const parent = container.querySelector("[data-logo-wall-target-parent]")
          || container.querySelector("*:has(> [data-logo-wall-target])")
          || container;
          parentCache.set(container, parent);
        });

        pool = originalTargets.map((n) => n.cloneNode(true));

        let front, rest;
        if (shuffleFront) {
          const shuffledAll = shuffleArray(pool);
          front = shuffledAll.slice(0, visibleCount);
          rest = shuffleArray(shuffledAll.slice(visibleCount));
        } else {
          front = pool.slice(0, visibleCount);
          rest = shuffleArray(pool.slice(visibleCount));
        }
        pool = front.concat(rest);

        for (let i = 0; i < visibleCount; i++) {
          const parent = visibleItems[i].querySelector("[data-logo-wall-target-parent]") || visibleItems[i];
          parent.appendChild(pool.shift());
        }

        tl = gsap.timeline({ repeat: -1, repeatDelay: loopDelay, paused: !!animateMode });
        tl.call(swapNext);
        activeTimelines.push(tl);
        if (!animateMode) tl.play();
      }

      function swapNext() {
        // Debounced visibility check - only run expensive check periodically
        const now = Date.now();
        if (now - lastVisibilityCheck > VISIBILITY_CHECK_INTERVAL) {
          lastVisibilityCheck = now;
          const nowCount = items.filter(isVisible).length;
          if (nowCount !== visibleCount) {
            setup();
            return;
          }
        }
        if (!pool.length) return;

        const idx = pattern[patternIndex % visibleCount];
        patternIndex++;

        const container = visibleItems[idx];
        if (!container) {
          setup();
          return;
        }

        // Use cached parent lookup instead of expensive :has() query
        const parent = parentCache.get(container) || container;

        const existing = parent.querySelectorAll("[data-logo-wall-target]");
        if (existing.length > 1) return;

        const current = parent.querySelector("[data-logo-wall-target]");
        const incoming = pool.shift();

        gsap.set(incoming, { yPercent: 50, autoAlpha: 0 });
        parent.appendChild(incoming);

        if (current) {
          gsap.to(current, {
            yPercent: -50,
            autoAlpha: 0,
            duration,
            ease: "expo.inOut",
            onComplete: () => {
              current.remove();
              pool.push(current);
            },
          });
        }

        gsap.to(incoming, {
          yPercent: 0,
          autoAlpha: 1,
          duration,
          delay: 0.1,
          ease: "expo.inOut",
        });
      }

      setup();

      // Handle entrance animation based on mode
      if (animateMode === "load") {
        // Use requestIdleCallback to defer animation start until browser is less busy
        const startAnimation = () => {
          animateEntrance(() => { if (tl) tl.play(); });
        };

        if ('requestIdleCallback' in window) {
          requestIdleCallback(() => gsap.delayedCall(0.2, startAnimation), { timeout: 500 });
        } else {
          gsap.delayedCall(0.5, startAnimation);
        }
      }

      // Single ScrollTrigger handles both entrance animation and pause/play when off-screen
      ScrollTrigger.create({
        trigger: root,
        start: "top bottom",
        end: "bottom top",
        onEnter: () => {
          if (animateMode === "scroll") {
            animateEntrance(() => { if (tl) tl.play(); });
          } else if (!animateMode && tl) {
            tl.play();
          }
        },
        onLeave: () => tl && tl.pause(),
        onEnterBack: () => tl && tl.play(),
        onLeaveBack: () => tl && tl.pause(),
      });
    }

    function init() {
      // Check if GSAP and plugins are loaded
      if (typeof gsap === "undefined" || typeof ScrollTrigger === "undefined") {
        console.error("GSAP or ScrollTrigger not loaded");
        return;
      }

      const wrappers = document.querySelectorAll(".logo_wall_wrap");
      if (!wrappers.length) return;

      wrappers.forEach((element) => {
        if (element.dataset.scriptInitialized) return;
        element.dataset.scriptInitialized = "true";

        const roots = element.querySelectorAll('[data-logo-wall-cycle-init="true"]');
        roots.forEach((root) => initLogoWallCycle(root));
      });
    }

    // Execute when DOM is ready or immediately if already loaded
    if (document.readyState === "loading") {
      document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", init);
    } else {
      init();
    }
  })();
</script></div><div data-logo-wall-animate="scroll" data-logo-wall-cycle-init="true" data-logo-wall-shuffle="false" data-logo-wall-rows="3" class="logo-wall_list_wrap w-dyn-list"><div class="pictogram_lottie"></div><div class="u-embed-js w-embed w-script"><script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    document.querySelectorAll(".pictogram_lottie_wrap").forEach((root) => {
      if (root.dataset.scriptInitialized) return;
      root.dataset.scriptInitialized = "true";

      /* ===================== CONFIG ===================== */
      const COLOR_MAP = {
        fills: [
          // Dark foreground
          { from: ["#131314", "rgb(19,19,20)", "rgb(19, 19, 20)", "#141413", "rgb(20,20,19)", "rgb(20, 20, 19)"],
           to: "var(--_theme---foreground-primary)" },

          // Light accent
          { from: ["#e3dacc", "rgb(227,218,204)", "rgb(227, 218, 204)"],
           to: "var(--_theme---pictogram-accent)" }
        ],
        strokes: [
          // None found in these three, keep your red mapping if other files use it
          { from: ["#ff0000", "rgb(255,0,0)", "rgb(255, 0, 0)"],
           to: "var(--_theme---pictogram-accent)" }
        ]
      };

      const FORCE_MODE = true; 
      const OBS_ROOT_MARGIN = root.getAttribute("data-lottie-rootmargin") || "0px 0px -10% 0px";
      const OBS_THRESHOLD   = Math.min(1, Math.max(0, Number(root.getAttribute("data-lottie-threshold") || 0.2)));

      /* ===================== helpers ===================== */
      const normHex = (hex) => {
        const h = String(hex||"").trim().toLowerCase();
        if (!h) return null;
        let v = h.startsWith("#") ? h.slice(1) : h;
        if (v.length===3) v = v.split("").map(c=>c+c).join("");
        if (v.length===6) return "#" + v;
        if (v.length===8) return "#" + v.slice(0,6);
        return null;
      };
      const toHex2 = (n) => Math.max(0,Math.min(255,Math.round(n))).toString(16).padStart(2,"0");
      const normRgb = (rgb) => {
        const m = String(rgb||"").replace(/\s+/g,"").match(/^rgba?\((\d+),(\d+),(\d+)(?:,([\d.]+))?\)$/i);
        if (!m) return null;
        return "#" + toHex2(+m[1]) + toHex2(+m[2]) + toHex2(+m[3]);
      };
      const normColor = (c) => {
        if (!c || /^none$/i.test(c)) return null;
        if (/^var\(/i.test(c)) return null; 
        return normHex(c) || normRgb(c);
      };

      function buildPairs() {
        const fills = [];
        const strokes = [];
        COLOR_MAP.fills.forEach(({from, to}) => {
          (Array.isArray(from)?from:[from]).forEach(f=>{
            const k = normColor(f);
            if (k) {
              const [r,g,b] = [k.slice(1,3),k.slice(3,5),k.slice(5,7)].map(v=>parseInt(v,16));
              fills.push({ hex:k, rgbLoose:new RegExp(`rgb\\s*\\(\\s*${r}\\s*,\\s*${g}\\s*,\\s*${b}\\s*\\)`,"gi"), to });
            }
          });
        });
        COLOR_MAP.strokes.forEach(({from, to}) => {
          (Array.isArray(from)?from:[from]).forEach(f=>{
            const k = normColor(f);
            if (k) {
              const [r,g,b] = [k.slice(1,3),k.slice(3,5),k.slice(5,7)].map(v=>parseInt(v,16));
              strokes.push({ hex:k, rgbLoose:new RegExp(`rgb\\s*\\(\\s*${r}\\s*,\\s*${g}\\s*,\\s*${b}\\s*\\)`,"gi"), to });
            }
          });
        });
        return { fills, strokes };
      }

      function recolorSvg(svgRoot, pairs) {
        if (!svgRoot) return;
        const maybeSwap = (val, list) => {
          const n = normColor(val);
          if (!n) return null;
          const hit = list.find(p => p.hex === n);
          return hit ? hit.to : null;
        };

        const nodes = svgRoot.querySelectorAll("path, rect, circle, ellipse, polygon, polyline, line, g, use");
        nodes.forEach(el => {
          const fAttr  = el.getAttribute("fill");
          const fStyle = el.style && el.style.fill ? el.style.fill : null;
          const fTo    = maybeSwap(fAttr, pairs.fills) || maybeSwap(fStyle, pairs.fills);
          if (fTo) { el.setAttribute("fill", fTo); if (el.style) el.style.fill = fTo; }

          const sAttr  = el.getAttribute("stroke");
          const sStyle = el.style && el.style.stroke ? el.style.stroke : null;
          const sTo    = maybeSwap(sAttr, pairs.strokes) || maybeSwap(sStyle, pairs.strokes);
          if (sTo) { el.setAttribute("stroke", sTo); if (el.style) el.style.stroke = sTo; }
        });

        svgRoot.querySelectorAll("stop").forEach(stop => {
          const scAttr  = stop.getAttribute("stop-color");
          const scStyle = stop.style && stop.style.stopColor ? stop.style.stopColor : null;
          const fTo     = maybeSwap(scAttr, pairs.fills) || maybeSwap(scStyle, pairs.fills);
          if (fTo) { stop.setAttribute("stop-color", fTo); if (stop.style) stop.style.stopColor = fTo; }
        });

        svgRoot.querySelectorAll("style").forEach(s => {
          const before = s.textContent || "";
          let css = before;
          pairs.fills.forEach(({hex, rgbLoose, to}) => {
            css = css.replace(new RegExp(hex.replace('#','\\#'), "gi"), to);
            css = css.replace(rgbLoose, to);
          });
          pairs.strokes.forEach(({hex, rgbLoose, to}) => {
            css = css.replace(new RegExp(hex.replace('#','\\#'), "gi"), to);
            css = css.replace(rgbLoose, to);
          });
          if (css !== before) s.textContent = css;
        });
      }

      /* ===================== setup per element ===================== */
      const src        = root.getAttribute("data-lottie-src");
      const loop       = !/^(false|0|no)$/i.test(String(root.getAttribute("data-lottie-loop")||"true"));
      const speed      = Number(root.getAttribute("data-lottie-speed")||1) || 1;
      const direction  = Number(root.getAttribute("data-lottie-direction")||1) === -1 ? -1 : 1;

      if (!src) return;

      let host = root.querySelector("[data-lottie-host]");
      if (!host) {
        host = document.createElement("div");
        host.setAttribute("data-lottie-host","");
        host.style.width = "100%";
        host.style.height = "100%";
        root.appendChild(host);
      }

      const prefersReducedMotion = matchMedia("(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)").matches;
      const pairs = buildPairs();
      const isDotLottie = /\.lottie(\?|#|$)/i.test(src);
      const hasDot = typeof customElements !== "undefined" && !!customElements.get("dotlottie-player");
      let api = null;

      if (isDotLottie && hasDot) {
        const player = document.createElement("dotlottie-player");
        player.setAttribute("src", src);
        player.setAttribute("renderer", "svg");
        player.setAttribute("autoplay", "false");
        player.setAttribute("loop", loop ? "true" : "false");
        player.style.width = "100%";
        player.style.height = "100%";
        host.innerHTML = "";
        host.appendChild(player);

        api = {
          isReady:false,
          play(){ try{ player.play(); }catch(e){} },
          pause(){ try{ player.pause(); }catch(e){} },
          setSpeed(n){ try{ player.speed = Number(n)||1; }catch(e){} },
          setDirection(d){ try{ player.direction = (d===-1?-1:1); }catch(e){} },
        };

        player.addEventListener("ready", () => {
          api.isReady = true;
          api.setSpeed(speed);
          api.setDirection(direction);
          const svgRoot = player.shadowRoot && player.shadowRoot.querySelector("svg");
          if (svgRoot) {
            recolorSvg(svgRoot, pairs);
            if (FORCE_MODE) (function loopRecolor(){ if (!root.isConnected) return; recolorSvg(svgRoot, pairs); requestAnimationFrame(loopRecolor); })();
          }
          if (prefersReducedMotion) api.pause();
        });

      } else {
        if (!window.lottie || !window.lottie.loadAnimation) return;
        const anim = window.lottie.loadAnimation({
          container: host,
          renderer: "svg",
          loop,
          autoplay: false,
          path: src
        });
        api = {
          isReady:false,
          play(){ try{ anim.play(); }catch(e){} },
          pause(){ try{ anim.pause(); }catch(e){} },
          setSpeed(n){ try{ anim.setSpeed(Number(n)||1); }catch(e){} },
          setDirection(d){ try{ anim.setDirection(d===-1?-1:1); }catch(e){} },
        };
        anim.addEventListener("DOMLoaded", () => {
          api.isReady = true;
          api.setSpeed(speed);
          api.setDirection(direction);
          const svgRoot = host.querySelector("svg");
          if (svgRoot) {
            recolorSvg(svgRoot, pairs);
            if (FORCE_MODE) (function loopRecolor(){ if (!root.isConnected) return; recolorSvg(svgRoot, pairs); requestAnimationFrame(loopRecolor); })();
          }
          if (prefersReducedMotion) api.pause();
        });
      }

      const io = new IntersectionObserver((entries)=>{
        if (!api || !api.isReady) return;
        entries.forEach(e=>{
          const inView = e.isIntersecting && e.intersectionRatio >= OBS_THRESHOLD;
          if (prefersReducedMotion) { api.pause(); return; }
          inView ? api.play() : api.pause();
        });
      }, { root:null, rootMargin: OBS_ROOT_MARGIN, threshold: OBS_THRESHOLD });
      io.observe(root);

      const mo = new MutationObserver(() => {
        if (!document.body.contains(root)) {
          try{ io.disconnect(); }catch(e){}
          try{ mo.disconnect(); }catch(e){}
        }
      });
      mo.observe(document.body, { childList:true, subtree:true });
    });
  });

<script>
  // Detect OS and show appropriate command
  (function() {
    'use strict';

    // Check for reduced motion preference
    const prefersReducedMotion = window.matchMedia('(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)').matches;

    // Detect OS once and cache result
    let osDetected = false;

    function detectAndSetCommandOS() {
      if (osDetected) return;
      osDetected = true;

      // Check for test parameter
      const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
      const isTestPC = urlParams.has('pc');

      // Modern API with fallback - detect Mac or Linux
      const isMacOrLinux = isTestPC ? false : (
        navigator.userAgentData
        ? (navigator.userAgentData.platform.toLowerCase().includes('mac') ||
           navigator.userAgentData.platform.toLowerCase().includes('linux'))
        : /Mac|iPhone|iPod|iPad|Linux/i.test(navigator.userAgent)
      );

      if (!isMacOrLinux) {
        const macCommands = document.querySelectorAll('[data-command-os="mac"]');
        const pcCommands = document.querySelectorAll('[data-command-os="pc"]');

        macCommands.forEach(el => el.style.display = 'none');
        pcCommands.forEach(el => el.style.display = 'flex');
      }
    }

    // Copy functionality with event delegation
    function handleCopyClick(event) {
      const target = event.target.closest('[data-copy]');

      if (!target) return;

      const textToCopy = target.getAttribute('data-copy');

      // Feature detection for Clipboard API
      if (!navigator.clipboard) {
        console.error('Clipboard API not available');
        return;
      }

      navigator.clipboard.writeText(textToCopy)
        .then(() => {
        let btnText = target.querySelector('.command_card_text');

        if (btnText) {
          showCopiedFeedback(btnText, prefersReducedMotion);
        } else {
          // Create temporary feedback element
          btnText = document.createElement('span');
          btnText.className = 'command_card_text';
          btnText.textContent = "Copied!";
          target.appendChild(btnText);

          if (prefersReducedMotion) {
            // No animation, just show and remove
            setTimeout(() => {
              target.removeChild(btnText);
            }, 1000);
          } else {
            btnText.style.opacity = '0';
            btnText.style.transition = 'opacity 0.3s ease';

            requestAnimationFrame(() => {
              btnText.style.opacity = '1';

              setTimeout(() => {
                btnText.style.opacity = '0';
                setTimeout(() => {
                  if (btnText.parentNode) {
                    target.removeChild(btnText);
                  }
                }, 300);
              }, 1000);
            });
          }
        }
      })
        .catch(err => console.error('Copy failed:', err));
    }

    function showCopiedFeedback(btnText, skipAnimation) {
      // Store original HTML once
      const originalHTML = btnText.innerHTML;

      if (skipAnimation) {
        // No animation for reduced motion preference
        btnText.innerHTML = "Copied!";
        setTimeout(() => {
          btnText.innerHTML = originalHTML;
        }, 1000);
        return;
      }

      // Cache computed styles once before any changes
      const computedStyle = window.getComputedStyle(btnText);
      const originalWidth = computedStyle.width;
      const originalStyles = {
        webkitLineClamp: computedStyle.webkitLineClamp,
        lineClamp: computedStyle.lineClamp,
        overflow: computedStyle.overflow,
        textOverflow: computedStyle.textOverflow,
        whiteSpace: computedStyle.whiteSpace
      };

      // Set up for transition while preserving line-clamp
      btnText.style.minWidth = originalWidth;
      btnText.style.transition = 'opacity 0.3s ease';

      // Fade out
      btnText.style.opacity = '0';

      // Use a single setTimeout chain instead of nested callbacks
      setTimeout(() => {
        btnText.innerHTML = "Copied!";
        btnText.style.opacity = '1';

        setTimeout(() => {
          btnText.style.opacity = '0';

          setTimeout(() => {
            btnText.innerHTML = originalHTML;

            // Restore original line-clamp properties
            if (originalStyles.webkitLineClamp !== 'none') {
              btnText.style.webkitLineClamp = originalStyles.webkitLineClamp;
              btnText.style.lineClamp = originalStyles.lineClamp;
              btnText.style.overflow = originalStyles.overflow;
              btnText.style.textOverflow = originalStyles.textOverflow;
              btnText.style.whiteSpace = originalStyles.whiteSpace;
            }

            btnText.style.opacity = '1';

            setTimeout(() => {
              btnText.style.transition = '';
              btnText.style.minWidth = '';
            }, 300);
          }, 300);
        }, 1000);
      }, 300);
    }

    // Initialize
    function init() {
      detectAndSetCommandOS();
      // Use event delegation on document - more efficient than multiple listeners
      document.addEventListener('click', handleCopyClick);
    }

    // Execute when DOM is ready or immediately if already loaded
    if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init);
    } else {
      init();
    }
  })();
